articles.description: South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen is in the running to win the 121st US Open at Torrey Pines.
articles.content:

articles.title: SA surgeons to reconstruct face of 9-year-old boy after Zimbabwe hyena attack - News24
articles.description: Plastic surgeons in South Africa are preparing to reconstruct the face of a nine-year-old Zimbabwean boy mauled by a hyena in an attack last month.
articles.content:
• A nine-year-old boy lost his nose, left eye, most of his upper lip, and bits of his forehead in a hyena attack.
